description: Episode of Series "First Aid for Fractures". Explains the seriousness of fractures of the skull, spine and pelvis. Through a series of simulated cases aboard ship and in the field, depicts specific procedures for recognising and treating each of these types of fractures. Suitable for medical and nursing professions and training of students.
